definition: Beijing Normal University/abbr. for 北京師範大學|北京师范大学[Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: In the HND Department of BNU, the focus is on students.
sentences.chinese: 在北師大HND項目部，學生是一切工作的重心。

sentences.english: After graduation, he was appointed as a teacher in Beijing Normal University in 1981.
sentences.chinese: 1981年畢業後何教授來到北師大任教。

sentences.english: Introduction: Recently, the 1st university Red Cross in Zhuhai was set up in Beijing Normal University, Zhuhai Campus.
sentences.chinese: 我市首個大學生紅十字會近日在北師大珠海分校成立。

sentences.english: Beijing Normal University Zhuhai Campus undergraduate third category belongs to the forefront.
sentences.chinese: 北師大珠海分校屬於第三類本科的前列。

sentences.english: Beijing Normal University, Associate Dean of Arts and Media Xiaoyong Liang said.
sentences.chinese: 北師大藝術與傳媒學院副院長肖永亮說。

sentences.english: School of Arts and Communications, Beijing Normal University, Zhuhai, China, 519087
sentences.chinese: 符進葉，女，北師大珠海分校藝術與傳播學院副教授。
